titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 3308) to amend title 10, United States Code, to limit the placement of United States forces under United Nations operational or tactical control, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 104-774, by Mr. Solomon.

Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 3308. Measure will be read by section. A specified amendment is in order. No amendment shall be in order except those printed in the report accompanying this resolution, to be considered in the order and manner specified.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 272.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 9/4/1996--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 3308 (United Nations control of U.S. armed forces).
